blogPost.excerpt:
The Tiny Desk is working from home for the foreseeable future. Introducing NPR Music's Tiny Desk (home) concerts, bringing you performances from across the country and the world. It's the same spirit — stripped-down sets, an intimate setting — just a different space.

Bobby Carter | March 3, 2021
Jack Harlow's Tiny Desk (home) concert feels like the arrival of a rap superstar. Tucked in a homey-looking space in Los Angeles surrounded by bookshelves and vintage furniture, the Louisville, Ky., emcee delivers a performance with the confidence of an old pro. His set, however, is the first time he's relied solely on live instrumentation to bring his songs to life. "It's been a long time since I had a chance to perform and I've never done it like this," he says.

This is a far stretch from the kid with loose curls and specs frolicing with his hometown friends, but his success should serve as a reminder of the importance of artist development. He's been able to slow cook for a few years, consistently dropping mixtapes and visuals until he landed a big hit last year in "WHATS POPPIN." That performance earned him a Grammy nomination ahead of his very impressive debut album, Thats What They All Say.

For this turn at the Tiny Desk, Harlow, his band and some background singers deliver a megamix of highlights from the album. The orchestration underscores his sentimental and introspective side on songs like "Same Guy" and "Funny Seeing You Here," but it also elevates the melody, which is the true hero here. Over the past few years, the 22-year-old rapper has steadily ticked the boxes for a successful career, and this showing undoubtedly checks the performer section.

SET LIST
"Rendezvous"
"21C / Delta"
"Funny Seeing You Here"
"Same Guy"
"Creme/ONCE MAY COMES"
"Whats Poppin"

MUSICIANS
Jack Harlow: vocals
O'Neil "Doctor O" Palmer: keys
Rico Nichols: drums
Joe Cleveland - bass
Rob Gueringer: guitar
Erik B: vocals
Chimera Patrice: vocals
Porcha Clay: vocals

CREDITS
Video: Ace Pro, Chadrick Fellers / WastedPotential, Donald Turner, Karis West, Kylie Hazzard
Audio: Nickie Jon Pabón, CJ Blair
Playback: Kenny Woods
Backline: Jonathan Castillo

TINY DESK TEAM
Producer: Bobby Carter
Video Producer: Morgan Noelle Smith
Audio Mastering: Josh Rogosin
Tiny Production Team: Bob Boilen, Kara Frame, Maia Stern
Executive Producer: Lauren Onkey
Senior VP, Programming: Anya Grundmann

His set, however, is the first time he's relied solely on live instrumentation to bring his songs to life. localize.title: 杰克-哈洛：Tiny Desk (Home)音乐会。
localize.description:
小小的办公桌在可预见的未来都是在家里办公。介绍NPR音乐的Tiny Desk（家庭）音乐会，为你带来来自全国和全世界的表演。



















波比-卡特｜2021年3月3日
杰克-哈洛的Tiny Desk(家)演唱会就像一个说唱巨星的到来。躲在洛杉矶一个看似温馨的空间里，周围摆满了书架和复古家具，这位来自肯塔基州路易斯维尔市的司仪以老牌专业歌手的自信进行表演。然而，他的表演是他第一次完全依靠现场乐器将他的歌曲带入生活。"我已经很久没有机会表演了，我从来没有这样做过。"他说。

这与那个留着松散的卷发、带着规格的孩子与家乡的朋友们嬉戏的情景相差甚远，但他的成功应该提醒人们艺术家发展的重要性。他这几年一直能够慢热，不断推出mixtape和视觉效果，直到去年在 "WHATS POPPIN "中大获成功。那次演出为他赢得了格莱美奖的提名，在他非常令人印象深刻的首张专辑《Thats What They All Say》之前。

这次在Tiny Desk，Harlow，他的乐队和一些伴奏歌手为大家带来了专辑中的精彩片段。在 "Same Guy "和 "Funny Seeing You Here "等歌曲中，管弦乐强调了他多愁善感和内敛的一面，但同时也提升了旋律，这才是真正的英雄。在过去的几年里，这位22岁的说唱歌手已经稳定地勾选了成功的事业，而这次的演出无疑勾选了表演者部分。

设置列表
"约会"
"21C/Delta"
"在这里见到你很有趣"
"同一个人"
"Creme/Once May COMES"
"Whats Poppin"

音乐家
Jack Harlow：主唱
O'Neil "Doctor O "Palmer：钥匙。
鼓手：Rico Nichols
Joe Cleveland - 贝斯
Rob Gueringer：吉他
Erik B：主唱
Chimera Patrice：主唱
Porcha Clay：主唱

学分
录像：Ace Pro, Chadrick Fellers / WastedPotential, Do Ace Pro, Chadrick Fellers / WastedPotential, Donald Turner, Karis West, Kylie Hazzard。
音频：Nickie Jon Pabón, CJ Blair Nickie Jon Pabón, CJ Blair
播放。Kenny Woods
后卫线：Jonathan Castillo Jonathan Castillo

TINY办公桌团队
制片人： Bobby Carter
视频制作人：Morgan Noelle Smith Morgan Noelle Smith
音频母带制作。Josh Rogosin
Tiny制作团队： Bob Boilen, Kara Frame, Maia Stern
执行制片人： Lauren Onkey
高级副总裁，编程。Anya Grundmann

localize.title: 傑克-哈洛：Tiny Desk (Home)音樂會。
localize.description:
小小的辦公桌在可預見的未來都是在家裏辦公。介紹NPR音樂的Tiny Desk（家庭）音樂會，爲你帶來來自全國和全世界的表演。



















波比-卡特｜2021年3月3日
傑克-哈洛的Tiny Desk(家)演唱會就像一個說唱巨星的到來。躲在洛杉磯一個看似溫馨的空間裏，周圍擺滿了書架和復古傢俱，這位來自肯塔基州路易斯維爾市的司儀以老牌專業歌手的自信進行表演。然而，他的表演是他第一次完全依靠現場樂器將他的歌曲帶入生活。"我已經很久沒有機會表演了，我從來沒有這樣做過。"他說。

這與那個留着鬆散的捲髮、帶着規格的孩子與家鄉的朋友們嬉戲的情景相差甚遠，但他的成功應該提醒人們藝術家發展的重要性。他這幾年一直能夠慢熱，不斷推出mixtape和視覺效果，直到去年在 "WHATS POPPIN "中大獲成功。那次演出爲他贏得了格萊美獎的提名，在他非常令人印象深刻的首張專輯《Thats What They All Say》之前。

這次在Tiny Desk，Harlow，他的樂隊和一些伴奏歌手爲大家帶來了專輯中的精彩片段。在 "Same Guy "和 "Funny Seeing You Here "等歌曲中，管絃樂強調了他多愁善感和內斂的一面，但同時也提升了旋律，這纔是真正的英雄。在過去的幾年裏，這位22歲的說唱歌手已經穩定地勾選了成功的事業，而這次的演出無疑勾選了表演者部分。

設置列表
"約會"
"21C/Delta"
"在這裏見到你很有趣"
"同一個人"
"Creme/Once May COMES"
"Whats Poppin"

音樂家
Jack Harlow：主唱
O'Neil "Doctor O "Palmer：鑰匙。
鼓手：Rico Nichols
Joe Cleveland - 貝斯
Rob Gueringer：吉他
Erik B：主唱
Chimera Patrice：主唱
Porcha Clay：主唱

學分
錄像：Ace Pro, Chadrick Fellers / WastedPotential, Do Ace Pro, Chadrick Fellers / WastedPotential, Donald Turner, Karis West, Kylie Hazzard。
音頻：Nickie Jon Pabón, CJ Blair Nickie Jon Pabón, CJ Blair
播放。Kenny Woods
後衛線：Jonathan Castillo Jonathan Castillo

TINY辦公桌團隊
製片人： Bobby Carter
視頻製作人：Morgan Noelle Smith Morgan Noelle Smith
音頻母帶製作。Josh Rogosin
Tiny製作團隊： Bob Boilen, Kara Frame, Maia Stern
執行製片人： Lauren Onkey
高級副總裁，編程。Anya Grundmann

previous.excerpt:
Lil Tjay and 6LACK’s “Calling My Phone” is their latest hit. The song peaked at No. 3 on the Billboard Hot 100, marking Tjay’s first Top 10 hit on the chart. It is produced by Non Native, Bordeaux, and G. Ry. On the track, Tjay and 6lack discuss a broken relationship.

Read more on Genius: https://genius.com/a/lil-tjay-6lack-break-down-the-meaning-of-calling-my-phone
Read all the lyrics to "Calling My Phone" on Genius: https://genius.com/Lil-tjay-and-6lack-calling-my-phone-lyrics
Watch the official music video for "Calling My Phone": https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zzd4ydafGR0

Subscribe to Genius: http://bit.ly/2cNV6nz
Genius on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Genius
Genius on Instagram: http://instagram.com/genius
Genius on Facebook: https://facebook.com/Geniusdotcom

next.excerpt:
It's Alive with Brad Leone is back for episode 78 and this time Brad is making fermented salsa. Join Brad as chars up some chilis and lets 'em ferment to make a salsa so nice you just might dip twice.
Follow Brad on Instagram: @brad_leone

Join Bon Appétit test kitchen guy, Brad Leone, on a wild, roundabout and marginally scientific adventure exploring fermented foods and more. From cultured butter and kombucha, to kimchi and miso, to beer and tepache, learn how to make fermented and live foods yourself.

Want Bon Appétit shirts, hats and more? https://shop.bonappetit.com/?utm_source=youtube&utm_brand=ba&utm_campaign=aud-dev&utm_medium=video&utm_content=merch-shop-promo

Still haven’t subscribed to Bon Appétit on YouTube? ►► http://bit.ly/1TLeyPn

Want more Bon Appétit in your life? Subscribe to the magazine! https://bit.ly/313UWRu

ABOUT BON APPÉTIT
Bon Appétit is a highly opinionated food brand that wants everyone to love cooking and eating as much as we do. We believe in seasonal produce, properly salted pasta water, and developing recipes that anyone can make at home. 


Brad Makes Fermented Salsa | It's Alive | Bon Appétit

localize.title: 布拉德做的发酵沙拉酱｜《活着》｜《开胃菜》｜《开胃菜》。
localize.description:
布拉德-莱昂的《活着》第78集又来了，这次布拉德要做的是发酵沙拉酱。加入布拉德的行列，让一些辣椒发酵，让他们发酵，使萨尔萨这么好，你可能只是浸两次。

在Instagram上关注Brad。@brad_leone



加入《Bon Appétit》测试厨房的家伙Brad Leone，进行一次狂野、迂回和略带科学性的冒险，探索发酵食品等。从培养黄油和昆布查，到泡菜和味噌，再到啤酒和tepache，学习如何自己制作发酵和活的食物。

想要Bon Appétit的衬衫、帽子和更多的产品？https://shop.bonappetit.com/?utm_source=youtube&utm_brand=ba&utm_campaign=aud-dev&utm_medium=video&utm_content=merch-shop-promo。

关于BON APPÉTIT

Bon Appétit是一个非常有主见的食品品牌，希望每个人都能像我们一样热爱烹饪和饮食。我们相信当季的农产品、适当盐渍的面食水，以及开发任何人都能在家制作的食谱。
